permafrost.tundra.time

Class TimeZoneHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.time.TimeZoneHelper

  • public class TimeZoneHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with time zones.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.TimeZone DEFAULT_TIME_ZONE
      The default time zone used by Tundra.
      protected static java.util.regex.Pattern OFFSET_HHMM_PATTERN
      Regular expression pattern for matching a time zone offset specified as HH:mm (hours and minutes).
      protected static java.util.regex.Pattern OFFSET_RAW_PATTERN
      Regular expression pattern for matching a time zone offset specified in milliseconds.
      protected static java.util.regex.Pattern OFFSET_XML_PATTERN
      Regular expression pattern for matching a time zone offset specified as an XML duration string.
      protected static java.util.SortedSet<java.lang.String> ZONES
      A sorted set of all time zone IDs known to the JVM.

                                         java.lang.String timezone)
        Converts the given calendar to the given time zone.
        Parameters:
        input - The calendar to be coverted to another time zone.
        timezone - The time zone ID identifying the time zone the calendar will be converted to.
        Returns:
        A new calendar representing the same instant in time as the given calendar but in the given time.

        Replaces the time zone on the given calendar with the given time zone.
        Parameters:
        input - The calendar to replace the time zone on.
        timezone - A time zone ID identifying the time zone the calendar will be forced into.
        Returns:
        A new calendar that has been forced into a new time zone.
